home.text: Do you need effective and good looking solutions for the frontend of your business? You're in the right place!

contact.other-contacts: You can also contact me from:

software-engineer.title: Marin Soluciones
description: Spearheaded migration of legacy Microsoft Access software to a modern tech stack, improving security and scalability.
Redesigned UI/UX using Figma, boosting user productivity by 30% through intuitive workflows and responsive design.
Engineered a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 40% and ensuring seamless updates.
Collaborated on backend optimization, achieving 70% faster performance and enhanced data security protocols.

frontend-developer.title: RWA Inc
description: Led end-to-end development of 5+ corporate tools, selecting tech stacks (React, Next.js, TailwindCSS) to meet project needs.
Supervised 4 developers, enforcing code quality standards and improving team productivity by 10% via Agile workflows.
Designed user flows and wireframes in Figma, aligning with stakeholders to ensure seamless UX across applications.
Architected scalable solutions, including a dashboard that reduced client-reported issues by 25% post-launch.
